page.title: 06Home Life B'ham
page.content: We carried out a questionnaire survey into Home Life. We found that in our area most people had lived there for more than 8 years and knew their neighbours well. Milk is delivered to the door. Most famillies have one meal together at night, some eat take away food. English is spoken most, also Punjabi,Gujerati,Hindi and Bengali. Dogs were the most popular pets. In the home men/boys are expected to do the decorating, gardening, car washing and general repairs. Women and girls are expected to do the washing, ironing, washing-up, baby sitting, cooking, cleaning the house and shopping. All homes surveyed had a television and all but one had a radio. One quarte of the homes surveyed had a video.
